mapper.select: select p.police_id,p.net_id,p.dep_id,p.name,p.identity,p.gender, p.birth,p.nation,p.origin,p.post,p.job_date,p.police_rank, p.education,p.device_num,p.device_type,p.device_date, ms.real_id,ms.real_pos,ms.real_time,ms.real_type from police p inner join man_pos ms on p.device_num=ms.device_num
